title: Monza Origin Relay
logline: Queen Boo, CiCi, and Sol.F1 shepherd a 10-minute Lego F1 short through the sovereign stack, sealing every motion in the SSOT while keeping drift at bay.

acts.title: Proof Wake
acts.purpose: Seed the sovereign archive with the foundational Monza script and bind the avatars to the relay mandate.

scenes.title: Council Vault
scenes.summary: Queen Boo convenes the council to awaken the dormant Monza capsule.
scenes.environment: Qube Sovereign Archive – obsidian vault with floating Merkle roots

beats.title: Seal Check
beats.description: Queen Boo verifies the integrity of the prior script branch before unlocking the binder.

beats.title: Tone Calibration
beats.description: CiCi aligns the emotional register to a resolute frequency before approvals flow.

scenes.title: Archive Calibration
scenes.summary: Sol.F1 showcases the story grid while Boo maps proof obligations to each act.
scenes.environment: Archive halo – holographic story grid suspended above Merkle rings

beats.title: Grid Projection
beats.description: Sol.F1 projects the twelve-scene grid and tags SSOT checkpoints per scene.

beats.title: Ledger Preview
beats.description: CiCi floats sample motion ledgers demonstrating stop-motion cadence holds.

scenes.title: Merkle Loom
scenes.summary: The council maps lineage commitments and sets override rules for remix branches.
scenes.environment: Merkle loom – threads of light weaving capsule hashes

beats.title: Lineage Draft
beats.description: Queen Boo drafts lineage ties linking the origin relay to prospective remixes.

beats.title: Override Covenant
beats.description: CiCi encodes override thresholds ensuring any fork replays proof rituals.

scenes.title: Launch Mandate
scenes.summary: The council authorizes Sol.F1 to begin ledger production under maker-checker watch.
scenes.environment: Council dais – avatars surrounded by attestation glyphs

beats.title: Attestation Roll
beats.description: Queen Boo records signatures for the launch capsule.

beats.title: Sol.F1 Briefing
beats.description: Sol.F1 accepts the motion ledger brief and promises fossils for SSOT sealing.

acts.title: Flow Synthesis
acts.purpose: Translate proof obligations into actionable motion and clip directives.

scenes.title: Avatar Relay
scenes.summary: Queen Boo orchestrates capsule routing while CiCi suppresses drift.
scenes.environment: DimIndex relay lattice – hexagonal nodes pulsing with flow order

beats.title: Routing Burst
beats.description: Queen Boo dispatches script, storyboard, and asset capsules to Sol.F1.

beats.title: Tone Dampening
beats.description: CiCi smooths emotional drift as the payload register ingests capsule metadata.

scenes.title: Previz Hatch
scenes.summary: Sol.F1 runs animatic rehearsals against Lego Monza plates.
scenes.environment: Sol.F1 PreViz bay – luminous sand tables with Lego circuits

beats.title: Origin Braid Animatic
beats.description: Sol.F1 generates the origin braid animatic and exports fossils to the SSOT.

beats.title: Variante Adjustment
beats.description: CiCi requests staggered holds for Variante cornering, producing a revised ledger.

scenes.title: Asset Chorus
scenes.summary: Material scientists finalize ABS livery cues while Boo enforces canonical palettes.
scenes.environment: Material lab – floating swatches of Lego ABS shimmering under tilt-shift lights

beats.title: Livery Lock
beats.description: Queen Boo locks the ABS palette and binds it to the capsule lineage.

beats.title: Plate Harmonies
beats.description: Sol.F1 composites tilt-shift plate variations to feed Sora conditioning.

scenes.title: Ledger Synchrony
scenes.summary: Avatar council walks through the execution tree, verifying stage readiness.
scenes.environment: Sovereign planning table – nested rings of stages lighting in sequence

beats.title: Tree Review
beats.description: Queen Boo reviews the execution tree ensuring every stage has a capsule.

beats.title: Checkpoint Sync
beats.description: CiCi captures a stabilizer checkpoint before clip rendering begins.

acts.title: Execution Assembly
acts.purpose: Render the modular clips, stitch the relay, and seal it into the SSOT.

scenes.title: Clip Forge
scenes.summary: Sora converts motion ledgers into ABS stop-motion clips under CiCi's guard.
scenes.environment: Sora clip forge – translucent film strips floating through tilt-shift fog

beats.title: Launch Clip
beats.description: The opening launch clip renders and is verified against the ledger.

beats.title: Variant Run
beats.description: Sora iterates Variante chicane clips to confirm cadence holds before sealing.

scenes.title: Pitlane Recovery
scenes.summary: A pitlane mishap becomes a test case for checkpoint recovery logic.
scenes.environment: Pitlane operations deck – holographic pit crew rewinding motion ledgers

beats.title: Checkpoint Recall
beats.description: CiCi replays the checkpoint to rewind to the pre-mishap ledger state.

beats.title: Ledger Proof
beats.description: Sol.F1 compares recovered frames to original fossils to validate deterministic replay.

scenes.title: Relay Assembly
scenes.summary: The council stitches modular clips into the final relay using the execution tree as a map.
scenes.environment: Relay amphitheater – concentric rings of film strips aligning with Merkle glyphs

beats.title: Continuity Audit
beats.description: CiCi verifies style capsules and motion ledgers align across sequences.

beats.title: Sound Seal
beats.description: Queen Boo approves the sound mix and signs the relay assembly capsule.

scenes.title: Broadcast Handover
scenes.summary: The finished relay is sealed, logged, and transmitted to the sovereign cinema network.
scenes.environment: Broadcast nexus – crystalline antennae projecting Merkle signatures

beats.title: Archive Seal
beats.description: The SSOT records canonical hashes and lineage pointers for the broadcast capsule.

beats.title: Signal Launch
beats.description: Queen Boo transmits the finished film with council attestation and drift monitors live.

council_directive: Maker-checker quorum required for any Monza remix. Drift monitors stay active through broadcast handover.
